review:
The appointments were running late by 2 hrs. 
Appoinment for 5 pm were taking place at 7pm .. 
Ni prior information from the staff. Too many opd patients taken without consideration of appointments

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to Dr. Tasneem mam for pregnancy in March 2022. She asked my earlier history and accordingly she took care during my entire pregnancy time. As I had one miscarriage earlier she was very serious and had given me Duphaston till end of my pregnancy. I had many complications like placenta previa initially , so she asked me to take rest and be careful. Then i had covid, gestational diabetes, colastasis. She explained us all the complications and risk factors and took my pregnancy seriously. I got normal delivery on October 2022 and my husband and I both are very thankful to Tasneem mam. She has given us a beautiful and cute Angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First off, she's very judgmental.  Also, the wait time was so long, more than an hour and not even worth it.  She took less than 5 minutes to explain the issue, made me take a bunch of tests* ****** **** *** *** ***** **** *** ****** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr. Tasneem with a complicated pregnancy case. I was really tensed the way things were moving, however I was pleasantly surprised to see the way she deals with her patients. The moment she starts talking to you, you know you are in the right hands. She handled my case with so much of ease that all my anxieties were gone. It was  a premature delivery for me 2 months in advance , Dr. Tasneem and her entire team in the hospital were making me feel so comfortable that I felt as if I am at home. It was a normal delivery. I am thankful to Dr. Tasneem and her entire team for their expertise and help. She is a wonderful doctor with immense knowledge and expertise and a lot of humility.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,Tubectomy,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
Dr. Tasneem is so friendly and caring, ever smiling angel to me and for my kids. My both the high risk deliveries were done by Dr. Tasneem with ease in Cloud9 and Manipal Hospitals - Whitefield.
She takes time, listen and writes every single concern I had and takes good care from the beginning of my pregnancies. 
I met many gynecologists before *** * *** *********** *** **** ***** *** **** ** *** **********
I highly recommend Dr. Tasneem with out any second thought. 
Thank you so much Doctor from my bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** **** ****** ** **** **** ******* ** **** She is having a rich quality experience with a huge confidence on her field. Every time we have seen her with a smiling face, who is eager to listen our problem and providing solutions which is perfect for us. At the end of the pregnancy, my wife had gone through  critical situation and she has resolved all the issues with her skills and experience and we are blessed with a baby boy with no complications. 
We are really blessed to have Tasneem as our doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,Pregnancy with PCOD,Labor and Delivery,
review: Dr Tasneem has been my wife's gynecologist for over 4 years now, and I must say she is the very best at her profession. She is a very well experienced, professional and friendly doctor. She treats her patients very nicely, and for any issues beyond her specialty, she recommends the absolute best doctors. My wife had a normal delivery, even though there were some complications, but Dr. Tasneem knew very well what she was doing and we were amazed at how well she was able to do the delivery with her team.

Wait time is longer then expected as per booked slots an hour late the management person calling name.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She might be doctor to others for me she is not less den a god. She has supported me throughout my pregnancy and answered all my questions with a big smile on her face.she is very calm and listens to your problems and gives a perfect solution. .some days were der where I visited just to get tat positive vibes from her....I am blessed with a princess.. i highly recommend Dr. Tasneem Nishah Shah.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started visiting Tasneem ma'am from 37th weeks of my pregnancy. Since we were new in bangalore we were not having idea about best gynaecologist to whom we can consult. We have visited 2 more gynaecologist but we were looking for hospital which will be near to our home. One of my friend suggested name of Tasneem ma'am. We have visited her for routine checkup. I had c section delivery on 7th jan 2020. It was a very nice experience. Since i have suffered a lot in my first c section, so i was afraid of it. Due to presence of Tasneem ma'am everything goes very well and i have recovered soon. She is like god to us.Thank you so much ma'am. She is one of the best gynaecologist. I highly recommend Tasneem Shah ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Tasneem is such a nice person to talk to. Never makes you panic, very friendly in nature, always attend you with a smile on her face, boost your confidence.I have been visiting her right from the beginning of my pregnancy. She listen all our quieres with paitence and answered all without being in hurry.With few complications, she monitored my reports and condition throughout pregnancy to ensure there are no complications during delivery. She will never encourage C section unless there is a need. During delivery, though I was having low confidence, she gave me lot of confidence to go through it and helped for normal delivery.Thanks alot for her continuous support and guidance. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In my full pregnancy till delivery I had consulated Dr. Tasneem and *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** *** has huge experience that really gives confidence to patient when solutions are provided by her. No unnecessary medicines were  recommended throughout the pregnancy. Very friendly nature with big smile ,positive vibes and explicitly to mention the guidance she provided.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Tasneem made me feel really comfortable and spoke to me about my problem and gave me assurance with a sweet smile which I really appreciate is because she is a good listener and advisor. I recommend people to go to her for any gynac problems she has excelled well in her profession *** *** * **** **** ********* ** *** ********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited the doctor twice and both times she seemed to be in hurry. Not interested to listen and quickly came to a conclusion without much explanation. Do not recommend. In hurry to get the next patient in and be done.

review: My wife having ovarian cyst surgery. After pregnancy, we are not expecting a normal delivery. But doctor TASNEEM make it happen( normal delivery). She is like a living GOD for us. Thank you doctor.
